column5: I am so alone I am in a relationship that has drained me my whole life iv had no one my mom was murdered when I was ten left home at 14because my dad was alcoholic and beat me almost to death. When mom was killed I was sent to stay with my aunt and her husband who sexually abused me then at 16 well I was pregnant my dad sexually abused me to at my apt . I never had anyone and now I'm with a list who took my heart and played with my soul once again I have no piece my stomach is sick all the time and my mind runs none stop I never had a dream because I was to busy surviving. I want to die and have a plan just don't want hurt my children they put on there own and amazing hate my life and myself
